## Query.replaceOne() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

To replace existing document with new document, if key is not present new document will be inserted

**Signature:**

```typescript
replaceOne(payload: DocumentType, options?: QueryReplaceOneOptions): this;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

payload


</td><td>

DocumentType


</td><td>

Document object to override


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[QueryReplaceOneOptions](./iodm-query.queryreplaceoneoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Query options


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

this


## Example


```ts
const query = new Query(idb, "store-name");
await query.replaceOne({ $key: key }, newDoc, options);
```
